name: Sibhatullah Amani
story: Sibhatullah Amani is a young soldier who joined OPFOR at the age of 18. His family has a long history of serving in the military and Sibhatullah followed their footsteps to become a soldier. He is proud of his service to his country but has also seen the darker side of war. Despite this, he remains focused on his duties as a soldier and serves as an assistant autorifleman in his unit.
